vendor_name: Anana Ecological Resort Krabi
title: Thailand: Krabi Five-Star Retreat with Panoramic Mountain Views, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Find the epitome of relaxation among southern Thailand’s striking limestone cliffs and peaceful forested valleys with a luxurious five-star Krabi escape. 

Just a 30-minute stroll from Ao Nang’s breathtaking stretch of beach, this sustainable oasis invites you to get back to nature and embrace green living through enriching amenities that focus on health and wellbeing.

Restore mind, body and soul with a spa treatment in the Asana Spa and a soothing dip in the natural volcanic-stone-tiled pools, or indulge in delicious food from the permaculture farm at Botanica. 

From yoga to meditation or an evening watching the sunset from Anana Sky Lounge, embrace opportunities to relax, rejuvenate and rediscover your connection to the natural world.
location_description: Anana Ecological Resort Krabi
offer_address: 1004 Soi Suan Tu Rian Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi 81180, Thailand

vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
title: BEST OF 2019: Experience Thailand’s Biggest Swimming Pool & Five-Star Sofitel Sophistication in Tropical Krabi
description:
Traditional colonial elegance and five-star luxury await at Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort: a sprawling coastal resort featuring the largest swimming pool in Thailand, impeccable dining options and an exclusive nine-hole golf course, all just steps from the pristine sands of Klong Muang Beach. Your glamorous escape includes daily buffet breakfast, an exquisite one-time set dinner, a 30-minute foot massage per room, 25% discount on spa treatments and resort’s activities, airport transfers from Krabi International Airport as per package and more. Plus, one child aged 11 years and under stays for free, including daily breakfast and kids’ club access. 

Feel like holidaying like a VIP? Get exclusive access to the Club Millésime with the Club Upgrade.
location_description: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort - 2019
offer_address: 200 Moo 3 T.Nongtalay, A.Muang Krabi, Krabi 81000, Thailand

vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
title: Award-Winning Krabi Beachfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Club Upgrades Available
description:
Perched on the pristine sands of Klong Muang Beach, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort offers one of Thailand's best family-friendly escapes - away from the crowds. Backed by Sofitel's signature hospitality, this award-winning haven invites you to laze by Thailand’s largest lagoon-style pool, savour massages by Sofitel So Spa and feel the sand between your toes at its private, palm-fringed beachfront.

Culinary excellence awaits at this serene resort, where you can sample the delights of six unique restaurants and bars, offering everything from authentic Thai dishes to wood-fired pizzas and Indian delicacies.

Visit the onsite nine-hole golf course, explore some of Thailand’s most beautiful islands by boat (like Phi Phi and James Bond Island) or spend your days lounging in the shaded gardens, sipping on a tropical cocktail from the pool bar.
location_description: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
offer_address: 200 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Amphur Muang, 81180 Krabi, Thailand

vendor_name: Amari Vogue Krabi
title: Krabi Beachfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Signature Massage & Airport Transfers
description:
Find your slice of beachfront paradise at the five-star Amari Vogue Krabi resort, on the pristine shores of Tubkaek Beach, just a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Soak up the spectacular scenery of limestone cliffs and bright turquoise waters as you unwind in luxury at this oceanfront retreat, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Phuket and Khao Lak. 

With three luxury pools, two restaurants and the Breeze Spa, Amari Vogue Krabi is the ideal escape for travellers who love surf, sand and sunshine. Located steps from the shore of picture-perfect Tubkaek Beach, within easy reach of the popular Ao Nang Beach, the shopping and nightlife of Krabi Town and the dazzling Koh Hong Islands, this beachfront oasis is the perfect launchpad to discover this enchanting part of Thailand.
location_description: Amari Vogue Krabi
offer_address: 149 Moo 3 Tambon, Tubkaak Beach Tubkaak, Nong Thale, Krabi 81180, Thailand

vendor_name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
title: Stunning Oceanfront Hideaway with Daily Dining and Cocktails
description: Find the perfect way to relax at Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi, a unique beachfront hideaway in Thailand. Let us take care of it all, from included roundtrip airport transfers to daily breakfast and your choice of daily lunch or dinner, plus one cocktail per adult, per day. For the ultimate indulgence, two 60-minute aromatherapy oil massages per adult are also included. Plus, one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with transfers and meals per package inclusions. A Club upgrade is also available for an added touch of VIP.
location_description: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi 2019
offer_address: 396-396/1, Krabi, Ao Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180, Thailand

vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
title: Sofitel Krabi Beachfront Escape with Thailand's Largest Pool, Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Daily Cocktails
description:
Perched on the pristine sands of Klong Muang Beach and surrounded by the verdant rainforests of Naga Mountain, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort is perfectly placed for embracing tropical Thai life - away from the crowds. Laze in the 7000sqm pool area framed by 300 sunbeds, dip your toes in Thailand's biggest lagoon-style pool or feel the sand between your toes as you make your way down to Sofitel's private beachfront. Fine dining is a given at this serene Sofitel resort, where you can sample the delights of six renowned restaurants and bars, with both local and international flavours to be found.

Work on your handicap on the nine-hole golf course or explore some of Thailand’s most beautiful islands by boat, then embrace true bliss with a treatment at So Spa. Or, simply spend your days lounging in the shaded sala pavilions, sipping on a carefully crafted cocktail from the pool bar. The choice is yours.
location_description: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
offer_address: 200 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Amphur Muang, 81180 Krabi, Thailand

You will love this resort’s friendly hospitality, lavish facilities and environmental focus, the perfect place for you to relax and unwind amid nature. Includes decadent dining experiences with fresh local produce, daily buffet breakfast, welcome drink on arrival, one-way airport transfer, guaranteed late 2pm checkout, buy-one-get-one-free cocktails and much more.

vendor_name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
title: Five-Star Krabi Beachfront Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience the breathtaking limestone karsts and turquoise waters of Krabi at Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi, a five-star resort perched in a stunning clifftop location in a picturesque private bay. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this secluded beach retreat is far from the crowds, but offers easy access to the surrounding 150-plus islands, including Ko Lanta and Ko Phi Phi. Savour the tastes of Thailand at onsite Suan Bua restaurant, dine on international cuisine at Lotus Court, enjoy an alfresco BBQ feast at COAST Beach Club & Bistro or try Japanese delicacies at Hagi.

When relaxing is in order, Spa Cenvaree is on hand to pamper tired muscles with rejuvenating treatments, a sauna and steam room. The private stretch of beachfront is book-ended by impressive limestone formations and offers the perfect spot to swim and relax. What are you waiting for? Krabi is calling.
location_description: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
offer_address: 396-396/1 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi 81180 Thailand

vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
title: Sofitel Krabi Stay with access to Thailand's Largest Lagoon Pool
description:
Unwind in five-star luxury at the newly refurbished Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort: a sprawling tropical paradise featuring Andaman Sea vistas, the largest lagoon pool in Thailand, impeccable dining options and an exclusive nine-hole golf course, just steps from the pristine sands of Klong Muang Beach.

Your escape includes daily breakfast and daily THB750 resort credit per room to spend on almost anything the resort has to offer, such as dining, drinks, excursions and activities.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast and complimentary kids club access. Or check out the Family Upgrade for up to two adults and three children.

**Looking for club luxury?** Choose the Club Upgrade, giving you access to Club Millésime with daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and canapés, and more.

vendor_name: Banyan Tree Krabi
title: Krabi Five-Star Beachfront Private Pool Suites with World-Class Spa
description:
Gaze across sapphire-blue waters and lush green mountains while absorbing the soothing jungle atmosphere at the five-star Banyan Tree Krabi - a luxurious haven perched on Tubkaek Beach.

Begin your day by plunging into your private pool before sampling delicious cuisine at The Naga Kitchen or Saffron. Set yourself up along the lounger-lined pool overlooking the beach, hit the sleek fitness centre or visit the expansive spa. There’s also a Kids' Club with a mini waterpark to entertain little ones, plus snorkelling gear and paddleboards for guests to explore secluded coves nearby. Then, round out your day at Kredkaew Bar or Bird’s Nest for front-row sunset views.
location_description: Banyan Tree Krabi
offer_address: 279 Tambon Nongtalay, Amphoe Muang, Krabi 81180, Thailand

Enjoy days by the breathtaking beach, explore the nearby islands or stay at the hotel and indulge in the premium onsite dining experiences.

vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
title: Krabi Beachfront Haven with Six Restaurants & Bars, Outdoor Pool & Golf Course
description:
Experience the height of Thai luxury at this five-star beachfront retreat, set along the tranquil shores of Klong Muang Beach in Krabi. With Sofitel's renowned service and world-class amenities, unwind in style by Thailand’s largest lagoon-style pool, enjoy soothing treatments at So SPA or stretch out on the golden shores just steps away.

The resort offers six diverse dining options, ranging from traditional Thai dishes to wood-fired pizzas and Indian specialties. Tee off at the onsite nine-hole golf course, take a scenic boat trip to iconic nearby islands such as Phi Phi and James Bond Island, or relax with a refreshing cocktail from the pool bar - be spoilt for choice at this tropical oasis.
location_description: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
offer_address: 200 Moo 3, Tambon Nongtalay, Amphur Muang, 81180 Krabi, Thailand

vendor_name: Rayavadee
title: Five-Star Krabi Beachfront Paradise
description:
Exclusivity reigns supreme at the five-star Rayavadee, a boutique hotel framed by sheer limestone cliffs and bordered by three of Krabi's most beautiful white-sand beaches. An idyllic Thai village-style resort of private pavilions and dramatic views over the glistening Phra Nang Peninsula, Rayavadee has well and truly earned its reputation for all-out tropical indulgence.

Perfectly located on the border of Krabi National Marine Park, Rayavadee is an oasis where you can dine in an ancient limestone cave with views of the crystal-clear Andaman Sea at The Grotto, watch the sunset from the ocean-view infinity pool, and find tranquillity at the onsite Rayavadee Spa. Home to four gorgeous restaurants and Eden-worthy tropical gardens, this is a true five-star Thai paradise.
location_description: Rayavadee
offer_address: 214 Ao Nang, อำเภอ เมือง Krabi 81000, Thailand

vendor_name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
title: Five-Star Krabi Tropical Hideaway with Cascading Pool, Beach Club & Four Restaurants
description:
Experience the breathtaking limestone karsts and turquoise waters of Krabi at this beachfront oasis, perched on a stunning clifftop and overlooking a picturesque private bay. This luxury retreat, accessible only by boat, unfurls a world of tropical seclusion and bliss, being far from the crowds yet within easy reach of the surrounding 150-plus islands, including Ko Lanta and Ko Phi Phi.

Savour authentic Thai cuisine at Suan Bua restaurant, feast on international delights at Lotus Court and indulge in an alfresco BBQ feast at the lively COAST Beach Club & Bistro. If you need some pampering, head to Spa Cenvaree and treat yourself to rejuvenating treatments. Go for a dip in the oceanfront pool and take a stroll on the private beach, book-ended by impressive limestone formations - this is an island escape like no other.
location_description: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
offer_address: 396-396/1 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180, Thailand
